column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat is one of my favorite spots for a night of good cocktails and food with good company. Hailing from LA
column2: the restaurant has a cool casual
column4: and boasts their whiskey selection. My personal favorites from the menu are the Mac & Cheese (go Chef's French Onion)
column7: and the Cornbread Madeleines (the combination with huckleberry butter is to die for). If parking right in front of the restaurant is full
column8: there is always the garage located on the far right side of the parking lot/shopping center.
